I am strongly considering buying Quest, but I have two questions...

1.  Are there many bugs in the current registered version?

I am asking because I looked at Adrift a couple of years ago, and it was extremely buggy, and after looking at their site yesterday, the current bug list is pretty amazing (In a bad way).

2.  Is there any limit on the size of a game I can make?

Thank you for your time...

Posts.EditableText:
1. There are no known bugs in Quest or Quest Pro at the moment.

2. There is no real limit on the size of a game. In practice you can't have more than 32767 of anything (rooms, objects etc. or lines of code) - but as far as I'm aware, nobody has ever got anywhere near close to these limits.
